Disaster preparedness and management
A “disaster” is an event that happens suddenly, 
without warning and involves large numbers 
of people.  Disasters can be both natural and 
man made. Common natural disasters that we know are floods, earthquakes, landslides, gas leaks, fire, and tsunami.
No one can be fully prepared for these 
disasters. But they can make some preparations. People who live in disaster-
